Package net.sourceforge.groboutils.autodoc.v1.junit

Helper classes for integrating AutoDoc into JUnit and the Ant 1.4.1 JUnit task.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AutoDocJUnitFormatter Interfaces with the Ant JUnit task to add a Listener into JUnit for the tests which report to the ITF framework.
AutoDocJUnitListener Listens to JUnit tests, and chains the calls to other listeners.
 

Package net.sourceforge.groboutils.autodoc.v1.junit Description

Helper classes for integrating AutoDoc into JUnit and the Ant 1.4.1 JUnit task.
